title: This AirPods Max case is actually protective without sacrificing the smarts
content:
If you don’t feel like spending $980 for a Gucci’s AirPods Max case, INTELLI just launched a more competitive Beats-like case for Apple’s premium headphone and that actually puts the product in the ultra-low-power mode.

more…

The post This AirPods Max case is actually protective without sacrificing the smarts appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: INTELLI just launched a more competitive Beats-like case for Apple's AirPods Max that actually puts the product in the ultra-low-power mode.
